# DROGON OPTIONS
set(BUILD_POSTGRESQL CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(LIBPQ_BATCH_MODE CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(BUILD_MYSQL CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(BUILD_SQLITE CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(BUILD_REDIS CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(BUILD_BROTLI CACHE BOOL OFF)

add_subdirectory(drogon)

set(QCORO_BUILD_EXAMPLES CACHE BOOL OFF)
set(USE_QT_VERSION 6)
add_subdirectory(qcoro)
